system.description: Move earth moves dirt (clay, loam, sand), possibly collapsing embankments, moving hillocks, shifting dunes. Rock formations cannot be collapsed or moved. Area up to 750 ft. square and up to 10 ft. deep; casting time is 10 minutes per 150-foot square (max area takes 4 hours 10 minutes). The spell creates wavelike crests and troughs; trees, structures, and rock are mostly unaffected except for elevation changes. It cannot tunnel and is generally too slow to trap or bury creatures. No effect on earth creatures.

components.materialDescription: A mixture of soils (clay, loam, and sand) in a small bag, and an iron blade.

system.target: Dirt in an area up to 750 ft. square and up to 10 ft. deep (S)
